main event: A yard-colored light flashed across the sky, leaving a long trail, at Tyndall AFB in Florida.
interesting points: The object was observed by both ground radar and visual sighting from the air.
The sighting was reported by various sources in and around Tyndall AFB.
No photographs were taken of the incident.
The object is described as a yard-colored light that flashed across the sky and left a long trail.
sighted object: a yard-colored light that flashed across the sky and left a long trail
